question:
Consider the following statements about Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana:
  1. The programmed aimed to promote Organic Production in the country
  2. Under the scheme every farmer is provided Rs. 20,000 per acre in three years for harvesting of crops and transportation
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Both are correct statementsParamparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (Traditional Farming Improvement Programme) has been launched by Government of India to support and promote organic farming and thereby improving soil health. This will encourage farmers to adopt eco-friendly concept of cultivation and reduce their dependence on fertilizers and agricultural chemicals to improve yields.
